name: 2019 International Conference on Modern Mechanical and Civil Engineering
content: Welcome to the 2019 International Conference on Modern Mechanical and Civil Engineering (ICMMCE 2019) which will be held during October 30-31, 2019 in Istanbul, Turkey. ICMMCE 2019 is organized by Middle East Association of Computer Science and Engineering (MEACSE). The main objective of ICMMCE 2019 is to provide a comprehensive global forum for experts and participants from academia and Industry to exchange ideas and present results of ongoing research in the most state-of-the-art area in ICMMCE 2019 topics. Researchers and practitioners are invited to submit their contributions to ICMMCE 2019\. Publication All submitted articles to ICMMCE 2019 should report original, previously unpublished research results- experimental or theoretical, and will be peer-reviewed. Articles submitted to ICMMCE 2019 should meet these criteria and must not be under consideration for publication elsewhere. All registered papers will be published by: Advances in Natural and Applied Sciences (ISSN: 1998-1090) (abstracting and indexing by Google Scholar, Ulrich Periodicals, EBSCO USA, CSA, CAB, THOMSON GALE,OPEN J-GATE, Index Copernicus, ISC ).Click here for guide for authors.
organizers: Middle East Association of Computer Science and Engineering
